1 using System;
2 using System.Collections.Generic;
3 using System.Linq;

5 namespace FullInspector.Internal {
6  public static class fiReflectionUtilitity {
11  private static Dictionary<Type, List<Type>> _creatableTypeCache;
12 
13  static fiReflectionUtilitity() {
14  _creatableTypeCache = new Dictionary<Type, List<Type>>();
15 
16  AppDomain.CurrentDomain.AssemblyLoad += (o, e) => {
17  _creatableTypeCache = new Dictionary<Type, List<Type>>();
18  };
19  }
20 
26  public static IEnumerable<Type> GetCreatableTypesDeriving(Type baseType) {
27  List<Type> result;
28 
29  if (_creatableTypeCache.TryGetValue(baseType, out result) == false) {
30  result = new List<Type>();
31  _creatableTypeCache[baseType] = result;
32 
33  // non-generic types
34  foreach (var type in from assembly in AppDomain.CurrentDomain.GetAssemblies()
35  from type in assembly.GetTypes()
36 
37  // extends the base type
38  where baseType.IsAssignableFrom(type)
39 
40  // cannot be abstract, an interface, or an open generic type
41  where type.IsAbstract == false
42  where type.IsInterface == false
43  where type.IsGenericTypeDefinition == false
44 
45  select type) {
46  result.Add(type);
47  }
48 
49  // generic types
50  if (baseType.IsGenericType) {
51  Type baseTypeGenericDefinition = baseType.GetGenericTypeDefinition();
52  Type[] baseTypeGenericArguments = baseType.GetGenericArguments();
53 
54  foreach (var openGenericType in from assembly in AppDomain.CurrentDomain.GetAssemblies()
55  from type in assembly.GetTypes()
56 
57  // cannot be abstract or an interface
58  where type.IsAbstract == false
59  where type.IsInterface == false
60  where type.IsGenericTypeDefinition
61 
62  where type.GetExactImplementation(baseTypeGenericDefinition) != null
63 
64  select type) {
65 
66  Type constructed;
67  if (TryConstructAssignableGenericType(openGenericType,
68  baseType, baseTypeGenericDefinition, baseTypeGenericArguments,
69  out constructed)) {
70  result.Add(constructed);
71  };
72  }
73  }
74 
75  }
76 
77  return result;
78  }
79 
83  private struct GenericParameterCandidate {
87  public Type Type;
88 
92  public string SourceParameterName;
93  }
94 
99  private static int GetIndexOfName(Type[] types, string name) {
100  for (int i = 0; i < types.Length; ++i) {
101  if (types[i].Name == name) {
102  return i;
103  }
104  }
105 
106  return -1;
107  }
108 
119  private static Type[] SelectBestTypeParameters(
120  List<GenericParameterCandidate> candidateTypes, Type openGenericType) {
121  Type[] genericArguments = openGenericType.GetGenericArguments();
122 
123  // figure out how many generic parameters we actually need
124  int requiredParameters = 0;
125  foreach (var type in genericArguments) {
126  if (type.IsGenericParameter) {
127  ++requiredParameters;
128  }
129  }
130 
131  var ordered = new Type[requiredParameters];
132 
133  // match types into the ordered array based on their name
134  var overflow = new List<Type>();
135  for (int i = 0; i < candidateTypes.Count; ++i) {
136  int index = GetIndexOfName(genericArguments, candidateTypes[i].SourceParameterName);
137  if (index == -1) {
138  overflow.Add(candidateTypes[i].Type);
139  }
140  else {
141  ordered[index] = candidateTypes[i].Type;
142  }
143  }
144 
145  // there were some types that didn't match by name; just insert them first come first
146  // serve
147  int start = 0;
148  foreach (var type in overflow) {
149  while (start < ordered.Length && ordered[start] != null) {
150  ++start;
151  }
152 
153  if (start >= ordered.Length) {
154  break;
155  }
156 
157  ordered[start] = type;
158  }
159 
160  return ordered;
161  }
162 
175  private static bool TryConstructAssignableGenericType(Type openGenericType,
176  Type baseType, Type baseTypeGenericDefinition, Type[] baseTypeGenericArguments,
177  out Type constructedType) {
178 
179  // The base type populated with openGenericType's generic parameters.
180  //
181  // For example, if
182  //- openGenericType = Derived{T1} : Iface{object, T1}
183  //- then
184  //- typeBaseType = IFace{object, T1}
185  //- currentParameters = new Type[] { typeof(object), T1 }
186  Type typeBaseType = GetExactImplementation(openGenericType, baseTypeGenericDefinition);
187  Type[] currentParameters = typeBaseType.GetGenericArguments();
188 
189  // We want to iterate over all of the current generic parameters for typeBaseType. If
190  // some of them are unspecified, then we will use those types from the baseType to
191  // construct our constructedType instance.
192  //
193  // For example, if
194  //- typeBaseType = Iface{object, T1, int, T3}
195  //- baseType = Iface{object, int, int, double}
196  //- then
197  //- typeParams = new List{Type} { typeof(int, double) }.
198  var typeParamCandidates = new List<GenericParameterCandidate>();
199  for (int i = 0; i < currentParameters.Length; ++i) {
200  if (currentParameters[i].IsGenericParameter) {
201  typeParamCandidates.Add(new GenericParameterCandidate() {
202  Type = baseTypeGenericArguments[i],
203  SourceParameterName = currentParameters[i].Name
204  });
205  }
206  }
207 
208  Type[] orderedTypeParams = SelectBestTypeParameters(typeParamCandidates, openGenericType);
209 
210  // Try to construct the generic type from our unspecified parameters. This could fail
211  // for a number of reasons, but for now we will just ignore them and say we failed to
212  // create the generic type. We accept that this method will never be fully perfect.
213  try {
214  Type createdType = openGenericType.MakeGenericType(orderedTypeParams);
215  if (baseType.IsAssignableFrom(createdType)) {
216  constructedType = createdType;
217  return true;
218  }
219  }
220  catch (Exception) { }
221 
222  constructedType = null;
223  return false;
224  }
225 
237  public static Type GetExactImplementation(this Type type, Type parentType) {
238  if (parentType.IsGenericType && parentType.IsGenericTypeDefinition == false) {
239  throw new ArgumentException("GetInterface requires that if the parent " +
240  "type is generic, then it must be the generic type definition, not a " +
241  "specific generic type instantiation");
242  };
243 
244  while (type != null) {
245  if ((type.IsGenericType && type.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == parentType) ||
246  (type == parentType)) {
247  return type;
248  }
249 
250  foreach (var iface in type.GetInterfaces()) {
251  if ((iface.IsGenericType && iface.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == parentType) ||
252  (iface == parentType)) {
253  return iface;
254  }
255  }
256 
257  type = type.BaseType;
258  }
259 
260  return null;
261  }
262 
263 
268  public static string GetObjectTypeNameSafe(object obj) {
269  if (obj == null) return "null";
270  return obj.GetType().CSharpName();
271  }
272  }
